title: (Tues Early Bird) Blind Karaoke: 2000’s Country + What’s the Haps: Why Bobby Wants to go to Mexico  + Mailbag: Mom Wants to Spy on Daughter’s iPhone
itunes:title: (Tues Early Bird) Blind Karaoke: 2000’s Country + What’s the Haps: Why Bobby Wants to go to Mexico  + Mailbag: Mom Wants to Spy on Daughter’s iPhone
description:
Bobby has Amy, Eddie Lunchbox and Abby compete in a karaoke competition where they don’t get to see the lyrics while singing the song.  Today’s category is 2000’s Country. We go around the room and share what is going on in our life right now inside of “What’s the Haps!”. In the mailbag, Bobby helps a mom who wants to know if she’s a helicopter parent for wanting to put a spying app on her soon to be teenager’s new iPhone.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
